data.author: Private Tier Software

changelog.release_notes:
I wasn’t too happy about the previous changes.  So, I changed some things back.

Changed: 
Date and day of the week is no longer hidden with seconds.

Fixed: 
24hr time displays correctly for 22:xx. 

Added: 
Day of the week is displayed. 

Changed: 
Date and day of the week is displayed with the seconds, with the wrist flick.

Fixed: 
24hr time displays correctly for 22:xx. 

Added: 
Day of the week is displayed. 

Changed: 
Date and day of the week is displayed with the seconds, with the wrist flick.

data.description:
I love the famous Simplicity watchface, but, every so often I wanted to see the seconds also.  Except, not all the time.  

So, I made this.  Simple date and time is displayed.  Now, if you want to see the second counter, just flick your wrist.  

After a certain amount of time, the seconds will go away, and your watch will be back in battery saving, slow, one frame per minute, mode.

latest_release.release_notes:
I wasn’t too happy about the previous changes.  So, I changed some things back.

Changed: 
Date and day of the week is no longer hidden with seconds.

data.title: Simple Seconds
